NK041(di)048:1: // mkhas grub r+aa ga a s+yas mdzad pa'i rnam dag bde chen zhing gi smon lam bzhugs so //
NK041(di)048:2: a mi d+he wa h+r+ai 'di nyid chags med thugs dam mdzod //
NK041(di)048:3: lag pa na yang 'bad nas bris //
NK041(di)048:4: mang po 'ga' la e phan bsams //
NK041(di)048:5: dpe gcod 'dod mi gda' na g.yor //
NK041(di)048:6: 'di las phan yon che ba med //
NK041(di)048:7: 'di bas zab pa'i gdams ngag med //
NK041(di)048:8: nga yi chos kyi rtsa ba yin //
NK041(di)048:9: rang gar ma skyur nyams len 'bungs //
NK041(di)048:10: 'di ni mdo lugs yin pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)048:11: lung ma thob kyang 'don ni rung //
NK041(di)048:12: e ma ho 'di nas nyi ma nub kyi phyogs rol na //
NK041(di)048:13: grangs med 'jig rten mang po'i pha rol na //
NK041(di)048:14: cung zad steng du 'phags pa'i yul sa na //
NK041(di)048:15: rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams bde ba can //
NK041(di)048:16: bdag gi chu bur mig gis ma mthong yang //
NK041(di)048:17: rang sems gsal ba'i yid la lam mer gsal //
NK041(di)048:18: de na bcom ldan rgyal ba 'od dpag med //
NK041(di)048:19: pad+ma r+aa ga'i mdog can gzi brjid 'bar //
NK041(di)048:20: dbu la gtsug tor zhabs la 'khor lo sogs //
NK041(di)048:21: mtshan bzang so gnyis dpe byad brgyad cus spras //
NK041(di)048:22: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mnyam bzhag lhung bzed 'dzin //
NK041(di)048:23: chos gos rnam gsum gsol zhing skyil krung gis //
NK041(di)048:24: pad+ma stong ldan zla ba'i gdan steng du //
NK041(di)048:25: byang chub shing la sku rgyab brten mdzad de //
NK041(di)048:26: thugs rje'i spyan gyis rgyang nas bdag la gzigs //
NK041(di)048:27: g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs //
NK041(di)048:28: sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yon pad dkar 'dzin //
NK041(di)048:29: g.yon du byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob //
NK041(di)048:30: sngon po rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pad+ma g.yon //
NK041(di)048:31: g.yas gnyis skyabs sbyin phyag rgya bdag la bstan //
NK041(di)048:32: gtso bo gsum po ri rgyal lhun po bzhin //
NK041(di)048:33: lhang nge lhan ne lham mer bzhugs pa'i 'khor //
NK041(di)048:34: byang chub sems dpa'i dge slong bye ba 'bum //
NK041(di)048:35: kun kyang gser mdog mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan //
NK041(di)048:36: chos gos rnam gsum gsol zhing ser ltem me //
NK041(di)048:37: mos gus phyag la nye ring khyad med phyir //
NK041(di)048:38: bdag gi sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:39: chos sku snang ba mtha' yas rigs kyi bdag /
NK041(di)048:40: phyag g.yas 'od zer las sprul spyan ras gzigs //
NK041(di)048:41: yang sprul spyan ras gzigs dbang bye ba brgya //
NK041(di)048:42: phyag g.yon 'od zer las sprul sgron ma ste //
NK041(di)048:43: yang sprul sgrol ma bye ba phrag brgya 'gyed //
NK041(di)048:44: thugs kyi 'od zer las sprul pad+ma 'byung //
NK041(di)048:45: yang sprul o rgyan bye ba phrag brgya 'gyed //
NK041(di)048:46: chos sku 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:47: sangs rgyas spyan gyis nyin mtshan dus drug tu //
NK041(di)048:48: sems can kun la brtse bas rtag tu gzigs //
NK041(di)048:49: sems can kun gyi yid la gang dran pa'i //
NK041(di)048:50: rnam rtog gang 'gyu rtag tu thugs kyis mkhyen //
NK041(di)048:51: sems can kun gyis ngag tu gang smras tshig /
NK041(di)048:52: rtag tu ma 'dres so sor snyan la gsan //
NK041(di)048:53: kun mkhyen 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:54: chos spangs mtshams med byas pa ma gtogs pa //
NK041(di)048:55: khyed la dad cing smon lam btab tshad kun //
NK041(di)048:56: bde ba can der skye ba'i smon lam 'grub //
NK041(di)048:57: bar dor byon nas zhing der 'dren par gsungs //
NK041(di)048:58: 'dren pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:59: khyed kyi sku tshe bskal pa grangs med du //
NK041(di)048:60: mya ngan mi 'da' da lta mngon sum bzhugs //
NK041(di)048:61: khyed la rtse gcig gus pas gsol btab na //
NK041(di)048:62: las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs pa'i //
NK041(di)048:63: tshe zad pa yang lo brgya thub pa dang //
NK041(di)048:64: dus min 'chi ba ma lus bzlog par gsungs //
NK041(di)048:65: mgon po tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:66: stong gsum 'jig rten rab 'byams grangs med pa //
NK041(di)048:67: rin chen gyis bkang sbyin pa byin pa bas //
NK041(di)048:68: 'od dpag med pa'i mtshan dang bde ba can //
NK041(di)048:69: thos nas dad pas thal mo sbyar byas na //
NK041(di)048:70: de ni de bas bsod nams che bar gsungs //
NK041(di)048:71: de phyir 'od dpag med la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK041(di)048:72: gang zhig 'od dpag med pa'i mtshan thos nas //
NK041(di)048:73: kha zhe med par snying khong rus pa'i gting //
NK041(di)048:74: lan gcig tsam zhig dad pa skyes pa na //
NK041(di)048:75: de ni byang chub lam las phyir mi ldog /
NK041(di)048:76: mgon po 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:77: sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa'i mtshan thos nas //
NK041(di)048:78: de ni byang chub snying po ma thob bar //
NK041(di)048:79: bud med mi skye rigs ni bzang por skye //
NK041(di)048:80: tshe rabs kun tu tshul khrims rnam dag 'gyur //
NK041(di)048:81: bde gshegs 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:82: bdag gi lus dang longs spyod dge rtsar bcas //
NK041(di)048:83: dngos su 'byor ba'i mchod pa ci mchis pa //
NK041(di)048:84: yid sprul bkra shis rdzas rtags rin chen bdun //
NK041(di)048:85: gdod nas grub pa stong gsum 'jig rten gyi //
NK041(di)048:86: gling bzhi ri rab nyi zla bye ba brgya //
NK041(di)048:87: lha klu mi yi longs spyod thams cad kun //
NK041(di)048:88: blo yis blangs te 'od dpag med la 'bul //
NK041(di)048:89: bdag la phan phyir thugs rje'i stobs kyis bzhes //
NK041(di)048:90: pha mas thog drangs bdag sogs 'gro kun gyi //
NK041(di)048:91: thog ma med pa'i dus nas da lta'i bar //
NK041(di)048:92: srog bcad ma byin blangs dang mi tshangs spyod //
NK041(di)048:93: lus kyi mi dge gsum po mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:94: rdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub ngag 'khyal pa //
NK041(di)048:95: ngag gi mi dge bzhi po mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:96: brnab sems gnod sems log par lta ba ste //
NK041(di)048:97: yid kyi mi dge gsum po mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:98: pha ma slob dpon dgra bcom bsad pa dang //
NK041(di)048:99: rgyal ba'i sku la ngan sems skyes pa dang //
NK041(di)048:100: mtshams med lnga yi las bsags mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:101: dge slong dge tshul bsad dang btsun ma phab //
NK041(di)048:102: sku gzugs mchod rten lha khang bshigs la sogs //
NK041(di)048:103: nye ba'i mtshams med sdig byas mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:104: dkon mchog lha khang gsung rab rten gsum sogs //
NK041(di)048:105: dpang zhes tshad btsugs mna' zos la sogs pa //
NK041(di)048:106: chos spangs las ngan bsags pa mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:107: khams gsum sems can bsad las sdig che ba //
NK041(di)048:108: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la skur ba btab //
NK041(di)048:109: don med sdig chen bsags pa mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:110: dge ba'i phan yon sdig pa'i nyes dmigs dang //
NK041(di)048:111: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal tshe tshad la sogs pa //
NK041(di)048:112: thos kyang mi bden bshad tshod yin bsams pa //
NK041(di)048:113: mtshams med lnga bas thu ba'i las ngan pa //
NK041(di)048:114: thar med las ngan bsags pa mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:115: pham pa bzhi dang lhag ma bcu gsum dang //
NK041(di)048:116: spang ltung sor bshags nyes byas sde tshan lnga //
NK041(di)048:117: so thar tshul khrims 'chal ba mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:118: nag po'i chos bzhi ltung ba lnga lnga brgyad //
NK041(di)048:119: byang sems bslab pa nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:120: rtsa ltung bcu bzhi yan lag sbom po brgyad //
NK041(di)048:121: gsang sngags dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:122: sdom pa ma zhus mi dge'i las byas pa //
NK041(di)048:123: mi tshangs spyod dang chang 'thung la sogs pa //
NK041(di)048:124: rang bzhin kha na ma tho'i sdig pa ste //
NK041(di)048:125: sdig pa sdig tu ma shes mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:126: skyabs sdom dbang bskur la sogs thob na yang //
NK041(di)048:127: de yi sdom pa dam tshig bsrung ma shes //
NK041(di)048:128: bcas pa'i ltung ba phog pa mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)048:129: 'gyod pa med na bshags pas mi 'dag pas //
NK041(di)048:130: sngar byas sdig pa khong du dug song ltar //
NK041(di)048:131: ngo tsha 'jigs skrag 'gyod pa chen pos bshags //
NK041(di)048:132: phyin chad sdom sems med na mi 'dag pas //
NK041(di)048:133: phyin chad srog la bab kyang mi dge'i las //
NK041(di)048:134: da nas mi bgyid sems la dam bca' bzung //
NK041(di)048:135: bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa sras bcas kyis //
NK041(di)048:136: bdag rgyud yongs su dag par byin gyis rlobs //
NK041(di)048:137: gzhan gyis dge ba byed pa thos pa'i tshe //
NK041(di)048:138: de la phrag dog mi dag'i sems spangs nas //
NK041(di)048:139: snying nas dga' bas rjes su yi rang na //
NK041(di)048:140: de yi bsod nams mnyam du thob par gsungs //
NK041(di)048:141: de phyir 'phags pa rnams dang so skye yis //
NK041(di)048:142: dge ba gang bsgrubs kun la yi rang ngo //
NK041(di)048:143: bla med byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
NK041(di)048:144: 'gro don rgya chen mdzad la yi rang ngo //
NK041(di)048:145: mi dge bcu po spangs pa dge ba bcu //
NK041(di)048:146: gzhan gyi srog bskyab sbyin pa gtong ba dang //
NK041(di)048:147: sdom pa srung zhing bden par smra ba dang //
NK041(di)048:148: 'khon pa sdum dang zhi dul drang por smra //
NK041(di)048:149: don dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod 'dod pa chung //
NK041(di)048:150: byams dang snying rje sgom zhing chos la spyod //
NK041(di)048:151: dge ba de rnams kun la yi rang ngo //
NK041(di)048:152: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams thams cad na //
NK041(di)048:153: rdzogs sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon par //
NK041(di)048:154: de dag rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo ni //
NK041(di)048:155: rgya chen myur du bskor bar bdag gis bskul //
NK041(di)048:156: mngon shes thugs kyis de don mkhyen par gsol //
NK041(di)048:157: sangs rgyas byang sems bstan 'dzin dge ba'i bshes //
NK041(di)048:158: mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed kun de dag la //
NK041(di)048:159: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs //
NK041(di)048:160: 'dis mtshon bdag gi dus gsum dge ba rnams //
NK041(di)048:161: 'gro ba sems can kun gyi don du bsngo //
NK041(di)048:162: kun kyang bla med byang chub myur thob nas //
NK041(di)048:163: khams gsum 'khor ba dong nas sprugs gyur cig /
NK041(di)048:164: de yi dge ba bdag la myur smin nas //
NK041(di)048:165: tshe 'dir dus min 'chi ba bco brgyad zhi //
NK041(di)048:166: nad med lang tsho rgyas pa'i lus stobs ldan //
NK041(di)048:167: dpal 'byor 'dzad med dbyar gyi gang+g+aa ltar //
NK041(di)048:168: bdud dgra'i 'tshe ba med cing dam chos spyod //
NK041(di)048:169: bsam pa'i don kun chos ldan yid bzhin 'grub //
NK041(di)048:170: bstan dang 'gro la phan thogs rgya chen 'grub //
NK041(di)048:171: mi lus don dang ldan pa 'grub par shog /
NK041(di)048:172: bdag dang bdag la 'brel thogs kun //
NK041(di)048:174: sprul pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med //
NK041(di)048:176: mdun du mngon sum 'byon par shog /
NK041(di)048:177: de mthong yid dga' snang ba skyid //
NK041(di)048:178: shi ba'i sdug bsngal med par shog /
NK041(di)048:179: byang chub sems dpa' mched brgyad ni //
NK041(di)048:180: rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis nam mkhar byon //
NK041(di)048:181: bde ba can du 'gro ba yi //
NK041(di)048:182: lam ston lam sna 'dren par shog /
NK041(di)048:183: ngan song sdug bsngal bzod blag med //
NK041(di)048:184: lha mi'i bde skyid mi rtag 'gyur //
NK041(di)048:185: de la skrag sems skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:186: thog ma med nas da lta'i bar //
NK041(di)048:188: de la skyo ba skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:189: mi nas mi ru skye chog kyang //
NK041(di)048:190: skye rga na 'chi grangs med myong //
NK041(di)048:191: dus ngan snyigs mar bar chad mang //
NK041(di)048:192: mi dang lha yi bde skyid 'di //
NK041(di)048:193: dug dang 'dres pa'i zas bzhin du //
NK041(di)048:194: 'dod pa spu tsam med par shog /
NK041(di)048:195: nye du zas nor mthun grogs rnams //
NK041(di)048:196: mi rtag sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin //
NK041(di)048:197: chags zhen spu tsam med par shog /
NK041(di)048:198: sa cha yul ris khang khyim rnams //
NK041(di)048:199: rmi lam yul gyi khang khyim ltar //
NK041(di)048:200: bden par ma grub shes par shog /
NK041(di)048:201: thar med 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas //
NK041(di)048:202: nyes chen btson nas thar ba bzhin //
NK041(di)048:203: bde ba can gyi zhing khams su //
NK041(di)048:204: phyi ltas med par 'bros par shog /
NK041(di)048:205: chags zhen 'khri ba kun bcad nas //
NK041(di)048:206: bya rgod rnyi nas thar ba bzhin //
NK041(di)048:207: nub kyi phyogs kyi nam mkha' la //
NK041(di)048:208: 'jig rten khams ni grangs med pa //
NK041(di)048:209: skad cig yud la bgrod byas nas //
NK041(di)048:210: bde ba can du phyin par shog /
NK041(di)048:211: de ru sangs rgyas 'od dpag med //
NK041(di)048:212: mngon sum bzhugs pa'i zhal mthong nas //
NK041(di)048:213: sgrib pa thams cad dag par shog /
NK041(di)048:214: skye gnas bzhi yi mchog gyur pa //
NK041(di)048:215: me tog pad+ma'i snying po la //
NK041(di)048:216: bardzusa te skye ba len par shog /
NK041(di)048:217: skad cig nyid la lus rdzogs nas //
NK041(di)048:218: mtshan dpe ldan pa'i lus thob shog /
NK041(di)048:219: mi skye dogs pa'i the tshom gyis //
NK041(di)048:220: lo grangs lnga brgya'i bar dag tu //
NK041(di)048:221: nang der bde skyid longs spyod ldan //
NK041(di)048:222: sangs rgyas gsung ni thos na yang //
NK041(di)048:223: me tog kha ni mi phye bas //
NK041(di)048:224: sangs rgyas zhal mjal phyii ba'i skyon //
NK041(di)048:226: skye ma thag tu me tog phye //
NK041(di)048:227: 'od dpag med pa'i zhal mthong shog /
NK041(di)048:228: bsod nams stobs dang rdzu 'phrul gyis //
NK041(di)048:229: lag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa'i sprin //
NK041(di)048:230: bsam mi khyab par spros byas nas //
NK041(di)048:231: sangs rgyas 'khor bcas mchod par shog /
NK041(di)048:232: de tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des //
NK041(di)048:233: phyag g.yas brkyangs nas mgo la bzhag /
NK041(di)048:234: byang chub lung bstan thob par shog /
NK041(di)048:235: zab dang rgya che'i chos thos nas //
NK041(di)048:236: rang rgyud smin cing grol bar shog /
NK041(di)048:237: spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen thob //
NK041(di)048:238: rgyal sras thu bo rnam gnyis kyis //
NK041(di)048:239: byin gyis brlabs shing rjes bzung shog /
NK041(di)048:240: nyin re bzhin du phyogs bcu yi //
NK041(di)048:241: sangs rgyas byang sems dpag med pa //
NK041(di)048:242: 'od dpag med pa mchod pa dang //
NK041(di)048:243: zhing der blta phyir 'byon pa'i tshe //
NK041(di)048:244: de dag kun la bsnyen bkur zhing //
NK041(di)048:245: chos kyi bdud rtsi thob par shog /
NK041(di)048:246: rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med pa yis //
NK041(di)048:247: mngon dag'i zhing dang dpal ldan zhing //
NK041(di)048:248: las rab rdzogs dang stug po bkod //
NK041(di)048:249: snga dro de dag rnams su 'gro //
NK041(di)048:250: mi bskyod rin 'byung don yod grub //
NK041(di)048:251: rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas la //
NK041(di)048:252: dbang dang byin rlabs sdom pa zhu //
NK041(di)048:253: mchod pa du mas mchod byas nas //
NK041(di)048:254: dgong mo bde ba can nyid du //
NK041(di)048:255: dka' tshegs med par sleb par shog /
NK041(di)048:256: po ta la dang lcang lo can //
NK041(di)048:257: rnga yab gling dang o rgyan yul //
NK041(di)048:258: sprul sku'i zhing khams bye ba brgyar //
NK041(di)048:259: spyan ras gzigs dang sgrol ma dang //
NK041(di)048:260: phyag rdor pad 'byung bye ba brgya //
NK041(di)048:261: mjal zhing mchod pa rgya mtshos mchod //
NK041(di)048:262: dbang dang gdams ngag zab mo zhu //
NK041(di)048:263: myur du rang gnas bde chen zhing //
NK041(di)048:264: thogs pa med par phyin par shog /
NK041(di)048:265: shul gyi nye du grwa slob sogs //
NK041(di)048:266: lha yi mig gis gsal bar mthong //
NK041(di)048:267: srung skyob byin gyis rlob byed cing //
NK041(di)048:268: 'chi dus zhing der khrid par shog /
NK041(di)048:269: bskal bzang 'di yi bskal pa'i yun //
NK041(di)048:270: bde ba can gyi zhag gcig ste //
NK041(di)048:271: bskal pa grangs med 'chi ba med //
NK041(di)048:272: rtag tu zhing de 'dzin par shog /
NK041(di)048:273: byams pa nas bzung mos pa'i bar //
NK041(di)048:274: bskal bzang 'di yi sangs rgyas rnams //
NK041(di)048:277: sangs rgyas mchod cing dam chos nyan //
NK041(di)048:278: slar yang bde chen zhing khams su //
NK041(di)048:279: thogs pa med par 'gro bar shog /
NK041(di)048:280: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag /
NK041(di)048:281: brgyad cu rtsa gcig sangs rgyas zhing kun gyi //
NK041(di)048:282: yon tan bkod pa thams cad gcig bsdoms pa //
NK041(di)048:283: zhing khams kun las khyad 'phags bla na med //
NK041(di)048:284: bde ba can gyi zhing der skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:285: rin chen sa gzhi khod snyoms lag mthil ltar //
NK041(di)048:286: yangs shing rgya che gsal zhing 'od zer 'bar //
NK041(di)048:287: mnan na nem zhing btegs na spar byed pa //
NK041(di)048:288: bde 'jam yangs pa'i zhing der skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:289: rin chen du ma las grub dpag bsam shing //
NK041(di)048:290: lo ma dar zab 'bras bu rin chen brgyan //
NK041(di)048:291: de steng sprul pa'i bya tshogs skad snyan sgras //
NK041(di)048:292: zab dang rgya che'i chos kyi sgra rnams sgrog /
NK041(di)048:293: ngo mtshar chen po'i zhing der skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:294: spos chu'i chu klung yan lag brgyad ldan mang //
NK041(di)048:295: de bzhin bdud rtsi'i khrus kyi rdzing bu rnams //
NK041(di)048:296: rin chen sna bdun them skas pha gus bskor //
NK041(di)048:297: me tog pad+ma dri zhim 'bras bu ldan //
NK041(di)048:298: pad+ma'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro //
NK041(di)048:299: 'od zer rtse la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas brgyan //
NK041(di)048:300: ya mtshan chen po'i zhing der skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:301: mi khom brgyad dang ngan song sgra mi grags //
NK041(di)048:302: nyon mongs dug lnga dug gsum nad dang gdon //
NK041(di)048:303: dgra dang dbul phongs 'thab rtsod la sogs pa //
NK041(di)048:304: sdug bsngal thams cad zhing der thos ma myong //
NK041(di)048:305: bde ba chen po'i zhing der skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:306: bud med med cing mngal nas skye ba med //
NK041(di)048:307: kun kyang me tog pad+ma'i sbubs nas 'khrungs //
NK041(di)048:308: thams cad sku las khyad med gser gyi mdog /
NK041(di)048:309: dbu la gtsug tor la sogs mtshan dpes brgyan //
NK041(di)048:310: mngon shes lnga dang spyan lnga kun la mnga' //
NK041(di)048:311: yon tan dpag med zhing der skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:312: rang byung rin chen sna tshogs gzhal yas khang //
NK041(di)048:313: ci 'dod longs spyod yid la dran pas 'byung //
NK041(di)048:314: rtsol sgrub mi dgos dgos 'dod lhun gyis grub //
NK041(di)048:315: nga khyod med cing bdag tu 'dzin pa med //
NK041(di)048:316: gang 'dod mchod sprin lag pa'i mthil nas 'byung //
NK041(di)048:317: thams cad bla med theg chen chos la spyod //
NK041(di)048:318: bde skyid kun 'byung zhing der skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:319: dri zhim rlung gis me tog char chen 'bebs //
NK041(di)048:320: shing dang chu klung pad+mo thams cad las //
NK041(di)048:321: yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg /
NK041(di)048:322: longs spyod mchod pa'i sprin phung rtag tu 'byung //
NK041(di)048:323: bud med med kyang sprul pa'i lha mo'i tshogs //
NK041(di)048:324: mchod pa'i lha mo du mas rtag tu mchod //
NK041(di)048:325: 'dug par 'dod tshe rin chen gzhal yas khang //
NK041(di)048:326: nyal bar 'dod tshe rin chen khri bzang steng //
NK041(di)048:327: dar zab du ma'i mal stan sngas dang bcas //
NK041(di)048:328: bya dang ljon shing chu klung rol mo sogs //
NK041(di)048:329: thos par 'dod tshe snyan pa'i chos sgra sgrog /
NK041(di)048:330: mi 'dod tshe na rna bar sgra mi grags //
NK041(di)048:331: bdud rtsi'i rdzing bu chu klung de rnams kyang //
NK041(di)048:332: dro grang gang 'dod de la de ltar 'byung //
NK041(di)048:333: yid bzhin 'grub pa'i zhing der skye bar shog /
NK041(di)048:334: zhing der rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med //
NK041(di)048:335: bskal pa grangs med mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs //
NK041(di)048:336: de srid de yi zhabs 'bring byed par shog /
NK041(di)048:337: nam zhig 'od dpag med de zhi bar gshegs //
NK041(di)048:338: bskal pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed //
NK041(di)048:339: gnyis kyi bar du bstan pa gnas pa'i tshe //
NK041(di)048:340: rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs dang mi 'bral zhing //
NK041(di)048:341: de yi yun la dam chos 'dzin par shog /
NK041(di)048:342: srod la dam chos nub pa'i tho rangs la //
NK041(di)048:343: spyan ras gzigs de mngon par sangs rgyas nas //
NK041(di)048:344: sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa yi //
NK041(di)048:345: dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes byar gyur pa'i tshe //
NK041(di)048:346: zhal blta mchod cing dam chos nyan par shog /
NK041(di)048:347: sku tshe bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni //
NK041(di)048:348: 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug bzhugs pa'i tshe //
NK041(di)048:349: rtag tu zhabs 'bring bsnyen bkur byed pa dang //
NK041(di)048:350: mi brjed gzungs kyis dam chos 'dzin par shog /
NK041(di)048:351: mya ngan 'das nas de yi bstan pa ni //
NK041(di)048:352: bskal pa dung phyur drug dang bye ba phrag /
NK041(di)048:353: 'bum phrag gsum gnas de tshe chos 'dzin cing //
NK041(di)048:354: mthu chen thob dang rtag tu mi 'bral shog /
NK041(di)048:355: de nas mthu chen thob de sangs rgyas nas //
NK041(di)048:356: de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brtan pa ni //
NK041(di)048:357: yon tan nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal por 'gyur //
NK041(di)048:358: sku tshe bstan pa spyan ras gzigs dang mnyam //
NK041(di)048:359: sangs rgyas de yi rtag tu zhabs 'bring byed //
NK041(di)048:360: mchod pas mchod cing dam chos kun 'dzin shog /
NK041(di)048:361: de nas bdag gi tshe de barjesa ma thag /
NK041(di)048:362: zhing khams de'am dag pa'i zhing gzhan du //
NK041(di)048:363: bla med rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK041(di)048:364: rdzogs sangs rgyas nas tshe dpag med pa ltar //
NK041(di)048:365: mtshan thos tsam gyis 'gro kun smin cing grol //
NK041(di)048:366: sprul pa grangs med 'gro ba 'dren pa sogs //
NK041(di)048:367: 'bad med lhun grub 'gro don dpag med shog /
NK041(di)048:368: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe dang bsod nams dang //
NK041(di)048:369: yon tan ye shes gzi brjid tshad med pa //
NK041(di)048:370: chos sku snang ba mtha' yas 'od dpag med //
NK041(di)048:371: tshe dang ye shes dpag med bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)048:372: gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan ni sus 'dzin pa //
NK041(di)048:373: sngon gyi las kyi rnam smin ma gtogs pa //
NK041(di)048:374: me chu dug mtshon gnod sbyin srin po sogs //
NK041(di)048:375: 'jigs pa kun las skyob par thub pas gsungs //
NK041(di)048:376: bdag ni khyed kyi mtshan 'dzin phyag 'tshal bas //
NK041(di)048:377: 'jigs dang sdug bsngal kun las bskyab mdzad gsol //
NK041(di)048:378: bkra shis phun sum tshogs par byin gyis rlobs //
NK041(di)048:379: sangs rgyas sku gsum brnyes pa'i byin rlabs dang //
NK041(di)048:380: chos nyid mi 'gyur bden pa'i byin rlabs dang //
NK041(di)048:381: dge 'dun mi phyed 'dun pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK041(di)048:382: ji ltar smon lam btab bzhin 'grub par shog /
NK041(di)048:383: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:385: pany+tsan+d+ri ya a wa bo d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)048:387: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)048:390: na ma ut+ta ma sh+ri ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)048:391: zhes brjod nas phyag gsum 'tshal na 'bum ther du 'gyur bar gsungs /
NK041(di)048:394: tha ma yang phyag bdun yan 'tshal /
NK041(di)048:396: 'bring lo zla tsam ma chag pa /
NK041(di)048:397: tha ma nam skabs su kha nub tu gyu nas
NK041(di)048:398: bde ba can gyi zhing khams yid la dran zhing
NK041(di)048:399: 'od dpag med la thal mo sbyar te dad pa
NK041(di)048:402: phyi ma bde ba can du skye bar the tshom med de /
NK041(di)048:404: pad+ma dkar po 'chi med rnga sgra sogs kyi dgongs pa yin /
NK041(di)048:405: zhes dge slong r+aa ga a s+yas sbyar bas 'gro
NK041(di)048:406: ba sems can mang po bde ba can du skye
